ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: This course is a highly informative and very helpful course on procedural methods in computer graphics. I would recommend it to anyone that is interested in computer graphics. This course really gives a new, "procedural" perspective on the broader picture of computer graphics.
It helps to improve the research skills.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: I learned a lotabout procedural modeling and rendering techniques, acquired a basic understanding of historical development of computer graphics, and got more or less accustomed at reading technical papers. This course let me know the vast possiblities of computer graphics that I wasn't aware of before, and definitely strenghened my interest for computer graphics.
